reviewText: This was a Father's Day gift for my husband.  He thoroughly enjoyed it!
It turned out that you can't view it in the United States ....I was so disappointed.......it didn't work with our dvd players
What a great way to see the step by step operation and the art of a hand made car.  I learned alot about Rolls Royce and company.
This is a CD of the show on TV which I had missed. It is a beautiful presentation of the factory and very fun to watch!
